mapper.insert: insert into t_feed_comment set ifeed= #{ifeed}, iuser= #{iuser}, comment= #{comment}
mapper.select: select a.ifeed_comment as ifeedComment, a.comment, a.created_at as createdAt, a.iuser as writerIuser, b.nm as writerNm, b.pic as writerPic from t_feed_comment a join t_user b on a.iuser= b.iuser where a.ifeed= #{ifeed} order by a.ifeed_comment limit #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
